abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights photo-enhancing apps.
lead_paragraph: Photo-enhancing apps have proliferated in the age of Instagram, but only a few are well designed because the category is not particularly high tech.

headline.main: Video Feature: Frame Shops for Phone Photos
headline.print_headline: A Frame Shop in a Phone

snippet: Photo-enhancing apps have proliferated in the age of Instagram, but only a few are well designed because the category is not particularly high tech.
